title: Software Engineer
description: Build, maintain and optimize scalable REST APIs using Java Spring Boot, serving real-time Bloomberg bond data to customer-facing applications.
achievements: Improved platform scalability by cutting API latency 24% through query optimization and caching, directly enhancing user experience and reducing churn.
Delivered reliable financial insights by engineering an ETL pipeline that automated processing of 30K+ records daily, enabling near real-time reporting for finance and strategy teams.
Accelerated time-to-market by transitioning from monolith to microservices, reducing deployment times by 30% and aligning with company goals for faster product delivery.
Enhanced mobile performance by reducing GraphQL payload size 27%, improving load times for customers on low-bandwidth connections and supporting global growth objectives.
Increased engineering velocity by implementing automated CI/CD pipelines, raising release frequency 25% and aligning delivery speed with company innovation targets.

title: Software Engineer
description: Developed secure, cloud-native applications using Java Spring Boot and GraphQL to support messaging for 890+ healthcare facilities.
achievements: Increased system reliability by maintaining 97.9% uptime for healthcare messaging, supporting provider efficiency and patient communication goals.
Enabled scalable growth by integrating Azure Cloud services, aligning infrastructure with company objectives for resilient, cloud-native deployments.
Enhanced product innovation by implementing GraphQL interfaces, delivering real-time data transactions that improve responsiveness and customer satisfaction.
Protected patient trust by ensuring HIPAA compliance and rigorous security standards, meeting regulatory obligations and strengthening brand credibility.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Migrated mobile UI experiences to web using React and TypeScript for the RiderWeb platform.
achievements: Boosted platform performance by reducing average API call latency 16%, directly improving customer experience and retention.
Increased revenue opportunities by designing couponing and discount systems that aligned with company goals for customer acquisition and sales growth.
Drove cross-functional delivery by developing features across Node.js backends and Kotlin services, ensuring seamless integration within the broader tech ecosystem.
